arabic_text: وَدَخَلَ جَنَّتَهُۥ وَهُوَ ظَالِمٞ لِّنَفۡسِهِۦ قَالَ مَآ أَظُنُّ أَن تَبِيدَ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أَبَدٗا
translation: (35) And he entered his garden while he was unjust to himself.[788] He said, "I do not think that this will perish - ever.
footnotes: [788]- i.e., proud and ungrateful to Allāh.
